trans-unit.source: Implements the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService" /> interface.
trans-unit.target: 實作 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService" /> 介面。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService> class implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService> interface, which is the managed interface used to add handlers for menu commands and to define verbs.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService>類別會實作<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService>介面，這是用來加入的功能表命令的處理常式，並定義動詞命令的受管理的介面。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService> class is automatically offered by the package class to offer global commands for an entire package, and it is also offered by the `Microsoft.VisualStudio.Shell.WindowPane` class to offer commands for the current window.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService>封裝類別會提供全域整個封裝，命令會自動提供類別和它也提供`Microsoft.VisualStudio.Shell.WindowPane`類別，以提供目前視窗的命令。

trans-unit.source: This offering is always done through the service container, so anyone deriving from the package or window pane classes can remove or replace the default implementation of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService> interface.
trans-unit.target: 此供應項目都是透過服務容器，所以任何人都衍生自封裝或視窗窗格的類別可以移除或取代的預設實作<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService>介面。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService> class utilizes several other services.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService>類別會使用數個其他服務。

trans-unit.source: All of these services are optional, so the behavior of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService> class degrades if one or more services are missing.
trans-unit.target: 所有這些服務都是選擇性的所以行為<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService>類別會降低，如果一個或多個服務遺失。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows which services are used and for what purpose.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示所使用的服務及原因。

trans-unit.source: Service
trans-unit.target: 服務

trans-unit.source: Purpose
trans-unit.target: 用途

trans-unit.source: Used to discover the current selection in order to obtain verbs offered by the currently selected designer.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得目前選取的設計工具提供的動詞命令，以用來探索目前選取範圍。

trans-unit.source: Used to obtain the designer for the currently selected component, if any.
trans-unit.target: 如果有的話，用來取得目前選取的元件的設計工具。

trans-unit.source: Used to notify Visual Studio that the command status has changed.
trans-unit.target: 用來通知 Visual Studio 的命令狀態已變更。

trans-unit.source: Used to show context menus.
trans-unit.target: 用來顯示內容功能表。

trans-unit.source: The service provider that this service uses to obtain other services.
trans-unit.target: 這個服務用於取得其他服務的服務提供者。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: If the service is being used with a designer, the `serviceProvider` parameter should be the service provider for the designer, as is the case with <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface>.
trans-unit.target: 如果與設計工具，使用服務時`serviceProvider`參數應該是設計工具中，服務提供者，使用案例<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface>。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand" /> to add.
trans-unit.target: 要加入的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand" />。

trans-unit.source: Adds a command handler to the menu command service.
trans-unit.target: 將命令處理常式加入至功能表命令服務。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService.AddCommand%2A> method adds a command handler to the menu command service.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService.AddCommand%2A>方法會將命令處理常式加入至功能表命令服務。

trans-unit.source: Command handlers do not define the text, shortcut, or placement of a menu item.
trans-unit.target: Text、 快速鍵或功能表項目的位置，請勿定義命令處理常式。

trans-unit.source: Rather, they define the menu item’s behavior if the item is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 相反地，會定義功能表項目的行為，如果按下項目。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="command" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="command" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: A command handler <paramref name="command" /> already exists.
trans-unit.target: 命令處理常式 <paramref name="command" /> 已經存在。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerb" /> to add.
trans-unit.target: 要加入的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerb" />。

trans-unit.source: Adds a verb to the verb table of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService" />.
trans-unit.target: 將動詞命令加入至 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService" /> 的 verb 表格。

trans-unit.source: This verb is available regardless of what designer is currently selected.
trans-unit.target: 無論何種設計工具目前已選取使用此動詞命令。

trans-unit.source: Unlike menu commands, verbs can define the text that is displayed to the user, but they do not define the placement of the command on the actual menu.
trans-unit.target: 功能表與命令不同，動詞命令可以定義使用者顯示的文字，但它們不會定義命令的位置上的實際的功能表。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="verb" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="verb" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService" />.
trans-unit.target: 釋放 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService" /> 所使用的所有資源。

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService" />.
trans-unit.target: 釋放 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService" /> 所使用的所有資源。

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService.Dispose%2A> when you are finished using the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService.Dispose%2A> 使用完畢時，請呼叫 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService.Dispose%2A> method leaves the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService.Dispose%2A> 方法會將 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService> 保留在無法使用的狀態。

trans-unit.source: After calling <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService.Dispose%2A>, you must release all references to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: 在呼叫<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService.Dispose%2A>，您必須釋放所有參考<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService>讓記憶體回收行程可以回收記憶體的<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService>所佔用。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

trans-unit.source: Always call <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService.Dispose%2A> before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService>.
trans-unit.target: 在您釋放最後一個 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService.Dispose%2A> 參考之前，請務必呼叫 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService>。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService> object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: 否則工作窗格所使用的資源不會釋放，直到記憶體回收行程呼叫 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService> 物件的 `Finalize` 方法。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <see langword="false" /> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示釋放 Managed 和 Unmanaged 資源，<see langword="false" /> 則表示只釋放 Unmanaged 資源。

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService" />.
trans-unit.target: 釋放 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService" /> 所使用的所有資源。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會呼叫公用`Dispose()`方法和<xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: `Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose()` 叫用受保護`Dispose(Boolean)`方法`disposing`參數設定為`true`。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> 叫用`Dispose`與`disposing`設`false`。

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService> references.
trans-unit.target: 當`disposing`參數為 true，這個方法的任何 managed 物件所持有的資源全部釋出這個<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService>參考。

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會叫用每個參考物件的 `Dispose()` 方法。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="Dispose" /> can be called multiple times by other objects.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Dispose" /> 可以被其他物件呼叫多次。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" /> be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to <see langword="Dispose" />.
trans-unit.target: 在覆寫<see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />小心不要參考物件已處置過的早期呼叫中<see langword="Dispose" />。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to implement <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />, see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關如何實作<see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />，請參閱[實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

trans-unit.source: For more information about <see langword="Dispose" /> and <see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" />, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關<see langword="Dispose" />和<see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" />，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[覆寫 Finalize 方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。

trans-unit.source: Ensures that the verb list has been created.
trans-unit.target: 確定已建立動詞命令清單。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService.EnsureVerbs%2A> method creates the verb list if it has not already been created.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService.EnsureVerbs%2A>方法建立的動詞命令清單，如果它已經尚未建立。

trans-unit.source: Searches for the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand" /> associated with the given command ID.
trans-unit.target: 搜尋與指定命令 ID 相關聯的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID" /> to find.
trans-unit.target: 要尋找的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID" />。

trans-unit.source: Searches for the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand" /> associated with the given command ID.
trans-unit.target: 搜尋與指定命令 ID 相關聯的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand" /> associated with the given command; otherwise, <see langword="null" /> if the command is not found.
trans-unit.target: 與指定命令相關聯的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand" />，如果找不到該命令，則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The GUID of the command.
trans-unit.target: 命令的 GUID。

trans-unit.source: The ID of the command.
trans-unit.target: 命令的 ID。

trans-unit.source: Searches for the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand" /> associated with the given command.
trans-unit.target: 搜索與指定命令相關聯的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand" /> associated with the given command; otherwise, <see langword="null" /> if the command is not found.
trans-unit.target: 與指定命令相關聯的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand" />，如果找不到該命令，則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The GUID of the command list.
trans-unit.target: 命令清單的 GUID。

trans-unit.source: Gets the command list for a given GUID.
trans-unit.target: 取得指定 GUID 的命令清單。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> of commands.
trans-unit.target: 命令的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of the service to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: 要擷取之服務的 <see cref="T:System.Type" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the requested service.
trans-unit.target: 取得所要求服務的參考。

trans-unit.source: A reference to <paramref name="serviceType" />; otherwise, <see langword="null" /> if the service is not found.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="serviceType" /> 的參考，如果找不到服務，則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="serviceType" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="serviceType" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Invokes a command on the local form or in the global environment.
trans-unit.target: 在區域表單上，或在全域環境中，叫用命令。

trans-unit.source: The command to invoke.
trans-unit.target: 要叫用的命令。

trans-unit.source: Invokes the given command on the local form or in the global environment.
trans-unit.target: 在本機表單上，或在全域環境中，叫用指定的命令。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" />, if the command was found; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果找到命令，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The local form is first searched for the given command ID.
trans-unit.target: 本機表單第一次搜尋中有指定的命令識別碼。

trans-unit.source: If it is found, it is invoked.
trans-unit.target: 如果找到，它會叫用。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the command ID is passed to the global environment command handler, if one is available.
trans-unit.target: 否則，命令識別碼會傳遞給全域環境命令處理常式中，如果有的話。

trans-unit.source: The command to invoke.
trans-unit.target: 要叫用的命令。

trans-unit.source: A parameter for the invocation.
trans-unit.target: 引動過程的參數。

trans-unit.source: Invokes the given command with the given parameter on the local form or in the global environment.
trans-unit.target: 在本機表單上，或在全域環境中，叫用具有指定參數的指定命令。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" />, if the command was found; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果找到命令，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The local form is first searched for the given command ID.
trans-unit.target: 本機表單第一次搜尋中有指定的命令識別碼。

trans-unit.source: If it is found, it is invoked.
trans-unit.target: 如果找到，它會叫用。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the command ID is passed to the global environment command handler, if one is available.
trans-unit.target: 否則，命令識別碼會傳遞給全域環境命令處理常式中，如果有的話。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the status of a menu command has changed.
trans-unit.target: 發生於功能表命令狀態變更時。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandsChangedEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandsChangedEventArgs" />，其中包含事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService.MenuCommandsChanged" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發 <see cref="E:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService.MenuCommandsChanged" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService.OnCommandsChanged%2A> method is called by a menu command when its status has changed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService.OnCommandsChanged%2A>方法時，由呼叫功能表命令狀態已變更。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService.OnCommandsChanged%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService.OnCommandsChanged%2A> 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService.OnCommandsChanged(System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandsChangedEventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class’s <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService.OnCommandsChanged(System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandsChangedEventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 在覆寫<see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService.OnCommandsChanged(System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandsChangedEventArgs)" />在衍生類別中，請務必呼叫基底類別的<see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService.OnCommandsChanged(System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandsChangedEventArgs)" />方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

trans-unit.source: The command to remove.
trans-unit.target: 要移除的命令。

trans-unit.source: Removes the given menu command from the document.
trans-unit.target: 從文件中移除指定的功能表命令。

trans-unit.source: If there are no more commands in the command group, the group is removed.
trans-unit.target: 如果命令群組中有沒有更多的命令，會移除群組。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="command" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="command" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The verb to remove.
trans-unit.target: 要移除的動詞命令。

trans-unit.source: Removes the given verb from the document.
trans-unit.target: 從文件中移除指定的動詞命令。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="verb" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="verb" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The shortcut menu to display.
trans-unit.target: 要顯示的捷徑功能表。

trans-unit.source: The x-coordinate of the shortcut menu's location.
trans-unit.target: 捷徑功能表位置的 X 軸。

trans-unit.source: The y-coordinate of the shortcut menu's location.
trans-unit.target: 捷徑功能表位置的 Y 軸。

trans-unit.source: Shows the shortcut menu with the given command ID at the given location.
trans-unit.target: 在指定位置顯示具有指定命令 ID 的捷徑功能表。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation does nothing.
trans-unit.target: 預設實作不做任何動作。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of the designer verbs that are currently available.
trans-unit.target: 取得目前可用的設計工具動詞命令集合。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerbCollection" /> of the designer verbs that are currently available.
trans-unit.target: 目前可用之設計工具動詞命令的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerbCollection" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService.Verbs%2A> property provides a collection of verbs.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService.Verbs%2A>屬性提供的指令動詞的集合。

trans-unit.source: These verbs come from two places:
trans-unit.target: 這些動詞命令是來自兩個地方：

trans-unit.source: Verbs added through the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService.AddVerb%2A> method of <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService.Verbs%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 透過動詞命令<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService.AddVerb%2A>方法<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService.Verbs%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Verbs offered by the currently selected designer.
trans-unit.target: 目前選取的設計工具提供的動詞命令。

trans-unit.source: Verbs added to this service through the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService.AddVerb%2A> method are called global verbs because they are global to this service, but generally there is one instance of this service for each tool or document window.
trans-unit.target: 加入透過這個服務的指令動詞<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService.AddVerb%2A>方法會呼叫全域動詞命令，因為它們是全域範圍中這項服務，但通常是一個針對每個工具或文件視窗的這個服務執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Designer verbs are obtained by querying the service provider for <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost> and <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ISelectionService>.
trans-unit.target: 設計工具動詞命令藉由查詢的服務提供者取得<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost>和<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ISelectionService>。

trans-unit.source: If the selection service offers a primary selection, and a designer can be obtained for that selection from <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost>, the designer’s verbs are added to this list.
trans-unit.target: 如果選取項目服務提供主要選取項目，而且設計工具可以從該選取項目取得<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost>，在設計工具動詞命令會加入至這份清單。

trans-unit.source: If the name of a global verb conflicts with the name of a designer verb, the designer-provided designer verb takes precedence.
trans-unit.target: 如果與設計工具動詞的名稱衝突的全域動詞命令的名稱，設計工具提供的設計工具動詞的優先順序較高。
